# ATS.PRO

> High-performance, privacy-first ATS resume scanner for 2026 recruitment cycles.

## Core Capabilities
- **Neural Matching**: Simulates FAANG-level ATS scoring algorithms.
- **Privacy-First**: All processing happens in the browser; no resume data is uploaded to servers.
- **Market Benchmarking**: Provides instant feedback on "Market Value" based on keyword density.

## Key Links
- [Scanner](https://yourdomain.com/): The main neural scan interface.
- [FAQ](https://yourdomain.com/#faq): Technical details on how the 2026 algorithms work.
- [Privacy Policy](https://yourdomain.com/privacy): Details on the local-only data processing.

## Technical Specifications
- Built on: Next.js 16.0.7
- Processing Engine: Neural weights version 2026.1
- Dependencies: React 19, Lucide, Tailwind CSS
